byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta reported from the United Nations, and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon.
byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and ANNE BARNARD

abstract: United Nations humanitarian coordinator for Syria Yacoub El Hillo asks all factions in Syrian war to lift their sieges and allow aid agencies to deliver food and medical care to desperate civilians.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Asks Factions in Syrian War to End Sieges
headline.main: U.N. Relief Official Calls for ‘Immediate’ End to Blockades in Syria

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The plea from the United Nations humanitarian coordinator for Syria cited sick and malnourished residents in Madaya, some resembling “skeletons that are now barely moving.”
lead_paragraph: The plea from the United Nations humanitarian coordinator for Syria cited sick and malnourished residents in Madaya, some resembling “skeletons that are now barely moving.”
